Now delivering lunch to (order by 10am)...

Sourced Responsibly

We hold our suppliers to high standards so we can stand behind the source of our many ingredients.

Fresh Through Delivery

Our cars use state of the art equipment to keep your food fresh so it tastes like it just came from the kitchen.

Recyclable Materials

The materials and packing used to keep your Bento fresh are reusable and 100% recyclable.

The best food from the best chefs.

Our food is prepared fresh daily in our kitchen by a talented staff led by Chef Mattin Noblia, a world-renowned chef from Top Chef Season 6.

All of our food is:

  • Asian inspired
  • Prepared in a healthy manner — No MSG or additives added. We never abuse sugar, salt or fat.
  • Sourced responsibly — We hold our suppliers to high standards so we can stand behind the source of our ingredients.

Our servers have state-of-the-art equipment that keeps your food fresh from our kitchen to your door.

Bento drivers are family too.

Bento Servers are the face of our company. In fact, they're not contractors; they're employees. Drivers earn $19 - $22 per hour, have consistent schedules, and get free Bento every shift! Interested? Apply to drive for us!

Subscribe to our newsletter and we’ll keep you updated of our expansion plans and exciting Bento news!
